divs: Sighting Detailssunday aproximatly 9:30 pm stepped out of car when orange red light caought my eyes at first thought it was a helicopter but no noise,was also to low for anything else, watched it pass tree then disappear. called friend to tell her about 3 to 5 minutes later a second light appeared and followed same direction as first again disappeared after passing a hugh tree in my sight. Ran in the house to get camera knowing they travel in threes a third appeared from same direction also follwed same path as others. pictures did not come out good but will send, also put in flight path on day light veiw
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Coffeyville
There were no other sightings in Coffeyville on or around June 30th 2013
Summary: orange red oval caught my eyes
